description: Allows the mob to move in a circle around a point or a target.

radius_range.description: Range of radius in blocks of the circle to move around.

radius_adjustment_chance.description: A random value to determine when to increase the size of the radius up to the maximum. This has a 1/value chance every tick to do so.

height_above_target_range.description: When the mob finds a target, the range of height in blocks above the target to start the anchor point.

height_offset_range.description: The range of height in blocks offset the mob can have from it's anchor point.

height_adjustment_chance.description: A random value to determine when to change the height of the mob from the anchor point. This has a 1/value chance every tick to do so.

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the 'wiggle room' to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot.

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.
